1142.content: how does it happen? does she obtain a hypno ray gun? or does she find out she's only half Neithian, and her blood father was a Gundalian, and the war was started because the Emperor didn't like the idea of his subjects being intimate with Neithians?
1142.title: Fabia

11422.content:
"Dan..." Fabia found herself sighing out on her throne. She missed him oh so much. There's no reason to question why. He did a lot for her. Namely being the first person she could recall calming her out of her depression. She did a good job hiding it, but the war was eating her up in manys way, all of them coming back down to this: she caused it. It turned out her father was a Gundalian, and that the Emperor had no tolerance of inter-species relationships to begin with, let alone intimate ones with Neithians. However, Dan convinced her otherwise.

"Fabia, You're not what caused this war." She remembered Dan reassuring her. "Yes, you might have something to do with it, but you didn't cause it. This war was built up for years, I'd bet. They just used you as an excuse to slaughter each other. besides, Gundalians are violent by nature." She then remembered wrapping her arms around him, crying.

"Miss Sheen?" Fabia was brought out of the sweet past by one of her assistants.... whom she was hugging. "Is it wrong of me to assume you miss this Dan Kuso?"

"W...What makes you say that?"

"I noticed you using your newly developed powers on some of male castle residence to have them play the role of this Kuso fellow. I also hear you yell at them for not getting him down right. If I may say, that part is rather humorous." Fabia's blush was golden.... figuratively, of course.

"Um... you won;t tell anyone, right?"

"Of course not." She said, granting a sigh of relief from Fabia. "That said, I think you should go to this Dan fellow, if he is that important to you." She then handed her something that resembles a hand-held game system. "We'll give you a call should anything go wrong here."

"Um... How will I get to Earth?" Fabia asked, hiding her child-like glees from her.

"You seem to forget our teleport system can send you there, where ever you would desire."

"Good, let us go there right now!" She said. She actually had a.... devilish grin. Her 'powers' she got from her Gundalian side kicked in shortly after Dan and company left. And she has been needing to thank Dan for some time now.

"Queen Fabia, here you are." Where did Fabia go to?
11422.title: half-gundalian

choices: Yes (Reader's Choice on who, if anyone, is with him.)
114221.content: Quick Question: Was Dan Home?
114221.title: Outside Dan's Door

1142212.content:
Fabia found herself outside a house. "Well, I guess that this should be Dan's house." She walked up to the door and knocked. She found a surprisingly young women with Dan's Hair and Eyes on the other side. "Um.. is this the house of Dan Kuso?"

"You know Dan? Who are you?"

"I'm... Fabia. I was one of his fellow Brawlers."

"I, one of Dan's friends? Well, Dan's not home right now, but you can come in if you want."

"Sure." Fabia followed her inside.

"My name is Miyoko Kuso. I'm Dan's mother." She said, having the two sit down on the couch. Fabia.... was thrown for a loop by that last bit. "She's Dan's mom? She looks more like a sister than a mother."

"Anyway, his Dad is out for a worldwide business trip, and won't be back for a while." Fabia then got some ideas... she wasn't sure how to feel about them. Then again, how bad could it be? "So, what did you want with Dan?"

"Oh, not much" She said, hoping on top of her. "I just owe Dan some favors. And I think you could help."

"Um... Fabia, this isn't...."

"Shhhhh.." Fabia said, lightly hold Miyoko's chin in place, granting her a perfect view into each other's eyes. "Don't resist." She then gave a passionate, but short kiss on the lips - all while keeping her eyes open and focused. "In fact, I bet you'd enjoy this."

"Why" She weakly asked.

Fabia answered with another kiss. "Don't talk, honey. Not while we're doing this, anyway."

Kiss. Miyoko felt her will slip away. (Don't talk)

"You see, I better you've felt an itch for some love."

Kiss (I itch for love)

"And I can fix that for you."

Kiss (Fabia can help)

"As can Dan."

Kiss (Dan can help)

"Oh, Dan. He sure is hot."

Kiss (Dan.... No, can't.. think.... About... how hot.....)

"In fact, he's a good fuck buddy."

Kiss (Dan's a fuck buddy)

"In fact, why not test that out when he gets back., but until then..."

Fabia then place her arms around Miyoko, and began to passionately kiss. She then found herself wanted to return it. As the two went at it....

11422122.content:
Runo opened the door. "Mrs.Kuso, I got the apples..." She dropped the bags when she saw Miyoko and another weird girl together. "Um...Who is she Mrs.Kuso?" The blunette asked.
The two stopped kissing and looked at Runo. "Runo, this is Fabia, one of Dan's friends." Miyoko said. "What? Dan's friend? You better not have a crush on my Dan!" Runo yelled.
"That's why I am here, I have feelings for Dan, and I want to do him a favor, and you stay out of it." Fabia hissed, unleashing one of her reflex moves on the blue haired girl, knocking her out.
Later, Runo opened her eyes, and found herself...

choices: Fabia and Runo engage in some hot lesbian fun
114221222.content:
Hours later, Runo woke up.

"Where am I?" She groaned. The blunette looked around and saw what was around her. "Hey, what am I doing here in Dan's room?" She asked. Runo then looked down at herself, she was handcuffed to the floor. Fabia then walked up to her. "Fabia, or whatever your name is, let me go this instant!" She screamed. Fabia put her lips on Runo's and kissed. As the half neathian-gundalian girl was kissing her, Runo was mesmerized.

I have never felt like this before ever in my life. She thought. Fabia then broke the kiss. "Runo, when I kiss you again, you will be under my control along with Miyoko and we will serve Dan. You will also become bisexual and love me." She said and kissed her again.

Serve...Dan...under...control...along...with...Miyoko...become bisexual...love Fabia.. Runo thought. The dark blue haired girl then took Runo's clothes off and sucked on her nipples. Runo groaned at this pleasure, as she never felt anything like that before. After that, Runo's eyelids became droopy and she was motionless. Fabia unchained her and Runo just stood there, motionless. What does Fabia do to her?
114221222.title: Alone with Fabia

1142212222.content:
Fabia led the blunette to where Miyoko was. "Ok, both of you sit here and don't do anything. I'm going out to look for more girls that know Dan." She said to them.

Runo and Miyoko both nodded with blank stares on their faces. Fabia left the house and stood out on the sidewalk. "Now where should I start?" She asked herself. As the neathian was thinking, she heard a loud slam. Fabia looked in the direction where the sound was coming from and noticed a tan girl wearing a cheerleader outfit slamming down the trunk hatch of her Honda.

"Come on you piece of junk, just close already!" The white haired girl snapped. This gave Fabia and idea. Maybe this girl knows Dan.

As the white haired girl was going to walk up to the door, she noticed Fabia come up to her. "Hello, my name is Fabia, I'm new around here. Is there a chance that you know Dan Kuso?"

"You mean the one with brown hair that wears goggles on his head?" The tan skinned girl asked. Fabia nodded.

"Yeah, I'm a close friend of his, my name is Julie Makimoto. Nice to meet you." The girl now named Julie answered. So she's his close friend, perfect! Fabia thought. "Since you are his friend, then you can help me."

"Help you with what?" Julie asked. Before she could continue, Fabia slammed her against the wall and connected her lips with hers. Julie could feel her strength drain away as her eyes became droopy. Fabia seprated from her and went up to her ear. "When I kiss you for the second time, you must tell me all the girls that know Dan so I can bring them over to his house." She whispered.

Julie dumbly nodded and the neathian smirked. She started kissing Julie again, this time more deeper. Her wet tongue twined with the white haired girl's tongue, making each other moan in delight. After the kissing, Fabia stared at her. "Tell me." She said.

"Dan knows Alice and Mira." Julie said. "Where do they live?" Fabia asked.

"Mira is currently living with Marucho and Alice is living in Moscow, Russia." Julie answered.

"Thank you Julie. Now go into Dan's house and sit with Miyoko and Runo on the sofa." Fabia ordered. Julie nodded and went to Dan's house. "Now let's go see Marucho." She said, taking out her transporter. Fabia activated it, taking her to Marucho's large house.
1142212222.title: Fabia takes Runo to Miyoko

123221.content:
Alice could feel something squeezing her right breast, although she wasn't sure who it was. She looked down and noticed that Dan was out cold while his hand touching her right breast.

"Ahhh! Dan!" She cried in embarrassment as she took his hand off of him and got off of him. "Uughh..." Dan moaned. "What happened?"

"I'm so sorry! It's my fault!" The orange haired girl fretted. "I wasn't watching where I was running and I ran into you, making you fall down."

"Oh, so that's what happened." Dan said. He then leaned into Alice's face for a closer look. "Is there something on my face?" Alice asked in worry.

"Were you crying or something?" The brown haired boy asked.

"N-No, why are you asking that?" Alice stammered nervously.

"Because your nose and eyes are red and your face is wet too." He told her.

"Fine, I was crying because Shun broke up with me." Alice hastily spoke.

"Shun broke up with you?" Dan asked. Alice nodded.

"Well, that's not a surprise. Shun really doesn't take interest in girls anyway, the only girls he loves are his mom and Skyress."

"Then why did he date me then?" The orange haired girl asked. "I don't know, maybe he was bored and he wanted to kill some time." Dan shrugged. Alice sighed.

"Don't be so down, want to go to the park together and eat ice cream?" He asked.

"I'm not really in the mood for ice cream Dan." The brown eyed girl said. "Come on, I really hate to see you so down." He told her.

"Ok fine."

The two went to the park and sat down. Dan ordered himself chocolate chip and ordered strawberry for Alice. As soon as they got their cones, they sat down at the nearest bench, and started licking. "Thanks Dan, I feel a little better now." Alice thanked.

"No problem." He replied.

"Don't mind if I do!" Dan said and handed her his cone. Alice took a lick and felt the tangy strawberry flavor on her lips. "It's great. Thanks for letting me try Dan."

"You're welcome. I can't stand seeing a girl cry in pain. I'll go talk to Shun about why he did that? He doesn't know that girls are sensitive and all." Dan told her. Alice looked down at the ground in sadness. "I really did love him."

"Look Alice, there are many men around the world that are better than him. You'll find your destined one eventually." The brown haired teen told her.

What do they do now?

choices: the next day, on the battlefield, the secret is revealed
125132112.content:
"How difficult is it to crush the Neathian forces?!" Emperor Barodius asked in anger. "You were not even fighting Dan Kuso and his Dragonoid!"

"I am ashamed!" Kazarina said. "That Fabia Sheen and her Aranaut were too powerful for me!"

Barodius was about to destroy Kazarina, but stopped when he registered the name.

"Wait. Fabia Sheen?"

"Yes, Queen Serena's little sister."

Barodius got a devious smile on his face.

"This could work in our favor."

"What do you mean?"

"That child has a secret that even she is not aware of. This will surely destroy the Brawlers' teamwork."

Kazarina had no idea what was going on, but she dared not question him. All she knew was this would be good.
125132112.title: the emperor has something to tell Fabia

choices: in the woods, trying to commit suicide, but he stops her in time
1251321121.content:
"Ability activate!" Fabia said "Vector Fist!"

"Time to put you in your place!" Aranaut said as he took down a bunch of the Gundalian Bakugan being used by the earth kids being controled.

Suddenly, all the kids were teleported out.

"That battle didn't last as long as the others did," Jake said.

"Something is very wrong," Coredem said.

"A smart Bakugan for one from Neathia," a voice said.

"I know that voice!" Ren said.

As he said that, a figure came out into the clearing. Emperor Barodius, ruler of Gundalia, along with his Bakugan Dharak.

"Barodius and Dharak!" Linehalt said.

"Glad you still remember us, traitors," Dharak said.

"Well, if it's a fight you want, it's a fight you'll get!" Dan said. "You ready, Drago?"

"Oh, I'm not here for you."

Everyone was surprised at this. Someone wasn't interested in Dan and Drago?

"I'm here for the Neathian Princess."

"I accept your challenge!" Fabia said, getting ready to brawl.

"Not to brawl, but to enlighten you on the matter regarding your father."

"My father?"

"Yes. You see, your father wasn't from Neathia, but rather from Gundalia."

"What? No, that's not possible. He was a Neathian. My mom and sister said so!"

"Did you ever see an image of him, or wonder why you've never met him? It's because he was Gundalian, and I have no tolerence for interracial union, especially when a Gundalian is involved. In fact, child, it was your mere existence that started this war. You are the reason Neathia has suffered so much."

"You're lying! There's no way you could possibly know my father!"

"I think I'd know my own brother." Everyone gasped at this. "That's right, my brother is your father, so I'm your uncle. If you don't believe me, ask your sister. Farewell."

Barodius teleported away, leaving the brawlers stunned. Could she really be half-Gundalian and the neice of Barodius, the man who declared war on her home? There was only one way to know for sure.

--Later on, in the Neathian throne room--

"Hello, Brawlers," Queen Serena said. "You're lucky Barodius didn't attack you, though I don't understand why."

"He talked about Fabia's father, said you'd know," Shun said, causing Serena's face to downcast.

"Leave us." The guards did as the queen ordered, leaving her alone with the brawlers. Once they were gone, Serena returned her attention to them. "What did he say?"

"He said that Fabia's father was really a Gundalian, his brother," Marucho said. "And that Fabia is a huge part of the reason he declared war on Neathia."

"Serena, he was lying right?" Fabia asked, a pleading tone in her voice. "Please tell me he was lying! Tell me it's not true!" She saw the way her sister looked down. "No. No."

"I'm sorry, little sister, but Barodius spoke the truth. Your father is from Gundalia, and Barodius's brother. We're actually half-sisters."

"No, it can't be true."

"I'm afraid it is. This is your father."

Queen Serena showed them a holographic photo of Fabia's father, a Gundalian. She also showed them Fabia's DNA with traces of Gundalian in there.

"No... I'm a Gundalian? No. No."

"Fabia, just calm--," Shun tried to say, but Fabia smacked his hand away.

"This is a lie! Some sick joke! It has to be! It has to be!"

"It doesn't look like it," Jake said.

"Look at your eyes," Ren said.

Fabia looked into the wall, and saw her eyes. Her left eye was her Neathian eye, but the right one was that of a Gundalian.

"So...it's true? I'm Gundalian. I'm the reason Neathia's suffered so much."

"Fabia," Dan said, moving to comfort her.

"Leave me alone!"

Fabia ran out of the throne room in tears, not wanting to accept this.

"Fabia, wait!"

Dan ran after her, Shun just standing there.

"Aren't you gonna stop him?" Ren asked.

"Wouldn't matter. Once he does something, you can't stop him."

Everyone nodded, entrusting Dan.

Now, where does he find her?
1251321121.title: the next day, on the battlefield, the secret is...

12513211212.content:
Dan found himself running through the woods, in a desperate attempt to find Fabia. He found her Bakugan on the ground. "Which way is she?"

"That way!" He said, pointing in the direction Dan was already going. Dan pocketed the little creature so he could keep running. He found her on top of a tree stump, holding a knife up too her neck. "Fabia! Don't do this?"

"Why?" Fabia asked. "Why shouldn't I? You've seen what I've caused! We've seen what I've caused..." She had tears running down her face. "So many people died, because of me...."

"Fabia - you're talking crazy! People died because of Barodius. He used you as an excuse to cause war."

"That doesn't change anything! It's still because of me...."

"Fabia, you need to calm down and think about this." Dan said, as he walked a bit closer.

"GET BACK!!" Fabia said. That stopped Dan. "I'm what caused the problem."

"Fabia, you may be part of the problem." Dan said, slowly walking towards her again. "But you didn't mean to. And you're also what's part of the solution. That means more to me than anything." Dan was able to get up to the stump and climb up.

"Dan!" Fabia yelled, pointing her knife at her. "If you get any closer, I'll... I'll kill you!" This time, Dan was not stopping. Nothing Fabia yelled stopped him from moving. "I swear, Dan, I'll kill us bo-"

The blue-haired girl was in awe as she saw Dan's hand. He grabbed the knife by it's blade, causing his hand to bleed. He looked into her eyes. "It's hurts me to see you like this, Fabia." He pulled the knife out of her hands, and threw it to the ground. "Now listen." he said, moving closer. "You are not the bad guy. You are not the enemy. You are not Barodius. You are not his alley. You are Fabia Sheen. And, for as far as I care, you're just a beautiful human girl who I want to help because she's a good person. And nothing you say or do could or will change that."

Fabia was crying once more, but this time it was because she was happy. It doesn't matter. Not to Dan. It never would've matter to him. Or any of the others. "Dan.... I'm sorry... If I had killed myself, we would have lost. I let something so trivial get in the way of our mission... I owe you..."

"No, you don't. Fabia."

How does she react?

Emperor Barodius was in his throne, smirking with something in his hand. "What's so funny?" Kazarina snarled. "And what is that thing in your hand?"

"Nothing, I have just found a way to control that little neathian and make her come to our side. This gun will do it." The emperor answered. "Oh boy, I totally can't wait to see what it is." The haos gundalian rolled her eyes.

"Right now, just watch, as I press this button, she will wake up and walk to me, wearing nothing." He said and pressed it.

Fabia opened her eyes and stood up. "Hmmnn...Fabia...Where are you going?" Dan mumbled. It wasn't until she left the room that Dan followed her. "Fabia, where are you going at this time of night? It's too dark!" He yelled. Fabia turned around and smirked, "Barodius." She said and continued to walk. She then walked outside and fell into a pond, does her hypnosis snap away?

125132112121212211.content:
Fabia suddenly popped out of the lake, whipping her head left and right.

"Huh, what happened? Why am I outside, wet and naked?!" Fabia asked.

Dan got Fabia out, alerted the others, and once she was dried, the gang examined her to find out what happened. After an hour, Marucho and Ren came back with the results.

"Alright, we've finished the examination, and from what we can gather, it looks like Barodius used Fabia's mixed nature to try and make her switch sides," Marucho said.

"What?! Barodius..." Dan growled in anger. How dare he do such a thing to his Fabia.

"We found faint traces of radio waves in her brain," Ren continued.

"Ren and Marucho can try and create a signal blocker to keep them from reaching Fabia's brain, but it will take a little time," Linehalt said.

"Until then, it might be safer if Fabia's locked up and can't get out," Ren said.

"If it's best for everyone, then do it," Fabia said.

So, Fabia was locked in the dungeon, and the key was in Serena's hand.

--back in Gundalian--

"Darn, that little bitch! As soon as she fell in the lake, she snapped out of it from the cold! And now we can't control her. Looks like it didn't work."

"On the contrary, it did work. We know we can control her now."

"Not once they make that device."

"We'll see about that."

Barodius laughed at this.
125132112121212211.title: Yes

1251321121212122111.content:
A few hours later, Ren and Marucho came out of the lab and into the dungeon, carrying the key from Queen Serena. Marucho had a black collar in his hand.

"Here Fabia, wear this collar. It will block any waves that Emperor Barodius transports to your mind." The aquos brawler said. "Thanks." Fabia said and took the collar from her and put it around her neck.

"We aren't sure if the collar will block the waves yet, but this is why you are in here." Ren told her. Fabia nodded. As they were going to leave, Dan ran into the dungeon.

"Can I please be with Fabia?" He asked.

"Sure, Ren and I can see how much you really care about her." Marucho told him. Ren and Marucho then left the dungeon and Dan and Fabia were alone together.

"Dan...I'm really glad you came. I was scared." Fabia murmured softly, her warm breath touching Dan's shoulder, which made him shiver a little bit. "No problem, I was concerned and figured you want comfort." The pyrus brawler told her.

Fabia's eyes then glistened and she started to cry.
1251321121212122111.title: a few hour later, Ren and Marucho finish the de...

12513211212121221111.content:
Dan wrapped her arms around the haos brawler, patting her back and whispering soothing words of comfort.

Meanwhile in Gundalia, Barodius was about to push the button on his remote to control Fabia and bring her to their side. He had changed the frequency on the collar to establish control even with the brawlers' collar.

Back in Neathia, Marucho and Ren were watching the moniter to see waves travelling to the Neathian dungeon, and...


option 2: did nothing. the collar jammed all frequencies coming from Gundalian technology
12513211212121221111.title: Dan comforts her.

125132112121212211112.content:
Ren and Marucho went back to the lab and watched the screen. Purple waves which represented the frequency were going the opposite way. "Yep, our collar works." Ren murmured.

"Yeah, it looks like it won't take in the frequencies that Barodius is sending in." Marucho yawned. "I think i'll go back to sleep."

"Same thing." Ren said.

In gundalia, Barodius smashed his fist against the wall. "Damn it! Why won't anything work? Anything I do, it always backfires!" He yelled. "I tried telling you that, but you wouldn't listen." Kazarina scolded.

"Actually, I think I have a new idea." Barodius smirked, "And it is going to work."

"What is it genius?" Kazarina asked sarcastically.

"I shall brainwash that boy that Fabia loves and he can bring her to me." Barodius answered him. "Actually, that may work." The gundalian woman said.

"Of course." Barodius chuckles.
125132112121212211112.title: option 2

choices: they manage to finish them in time, but Dan suddenly grabs Fabia and flees
1251321121212122111121.content:
Fabia was let out of the dungeon since the collar managed to successfully bounce back the control waves from Barodius, even when he changed the frequency.

Ren worried that Barodius might find another way to get to Fabia, perhaps through one of them, so he and Marucho went to the lab to make somthing to keep the others protected, but it would take some time as the materials were sparse. They probably only had enough time and materials to make 10 at the most.
1251321121212122111121.title: The next morning...

info.brief_description: Used to be my Soul eater Love Story, but now a story about Pokemon and Bakugan.
info.description:
Alright, here we go. So here's the thing here. This has three options for the stories you can do. Each story has it's own unique rules, sometimes, but the general rules apply to all of them.
First one: Dan Kuso's Hypno Harem- Dan from Bakugan gets a harem through hypnotic means.
Exclusive Rule: Make sure to have creative ideas on how he hypnotizes the girls. Like a musk that overrides their brains. Or a magic tongue twister that has a variety of effects that happen when they mess up. One that'll make Mira lactate without being pregnant, and will make her love being milked. All forms of hypnosis are welcomed here. Go crazy with bimbos if you want.

Second one: Bakugan Girls Interactive. Basically like my other interactives, but with the Bakugan girls. No exclusive rule(s).

Third one: Pokegirl Interactive. An interactive about the Pokemon girls.
Exclusive rules: Max must be limited to at least one or threads, and can not snatch up all the girls. And must not be in the Serena thread at all.
Please include the female player characters, like Hilda.

New story: Ash Ketchum's Hypno Harem: same as the top.

New story: Pokemon/Bakugan Anthro stories: stories that revolve around the Bakugan and Pokemon being anthromorphed.

General Rules:
1: No scat, vore, gore, yaoi, or unbirth.
2: No weight gain, maybe. Alright, you can if you don't go overboard with it.
3: Expansion is fine.
4: Shrinking and growing is fine.
5: Bimbos are also fine.
6: No rape
7: No death
8: I think that's enough for now.
